title: Bug 117981: Unable to select items on the first attempt in library outline view
description: Description: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view.
OB: When attempting to select an item in the library outline view for the first time, the selection does not take effect.
EB: Upon the second attempt, selecting the label item works as expected.
SR: Steps to reproduce: 1. Add a label in the library file. 2. Attempt to select the label item in the library outline view. 3. Observe the selection behavior on the first attempt.
